item.title: Python Summary
item.description: Python Summary String Equals In [1]: s, t = 'Hello', 'Hello' In [2]: s == t Out[2]: True In [3]: s is t Out[3]: True In [4]: v = "".join(["He", "llo"]) In [5]: s == v Out[5]: True In [6]: s is v Out[6]: False In [7]: id(s), id(t), id(v) Out[7]: (4564168352, 4564168352, 4564117072) is is identity testing, == is equality testing; which means is equals to id(A) == id(B).
